00029 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00030 {
00031   createinfo(argc, argv);
00032 
00033   // enough arguments ?
00034 
00035   if (argc < 4) {
00036     fprintf(stderr, "\nusage: %s [OPTIONS] PROJPARA [SYMMETRY:]MBSTATE [SYMMETRY:]MBSTATE\n"
00037             "\n     -q QMAX         calculate to max momentum"
00038             "\n     -n NPOINTS      number of points"
00039             "\n     -p NALPHA-NBETA number of angles"
00040             "\n     -l MULTIPOLE    select only l-multipole transition"

00042             "\n     -t              test only\n",

00047   int npoints = 50+1;
00048   int nalpha = 5;
00049   int ncosb = 4;

00058 
00059   char c;

00061     switch (c) {
00062     case 'r':
00063       recoil = 1;
00064       break;
00065     case 'q':
00066       qmax = atof(optarg);
00067       break;
00068     case 'n':
00069       npoints = atoi(optarg);
00070       break;
00071     case 'p':
00072       projparas = optarg;
00073       char* ang = strtok(projparas, "-");
00074       nalpha = atoi(ang);
00075       ang = strtok(NULL, "-");
00076       ncosb = atoi(ang);
00077       break;
00078     case 't':
00079       test = 1;
00080       break;
00081     case 'l':
00082       l = atoi(optarg);
00083       break;
00084     }
00085 
00086   char* projpar = argv[optind];
00087   char** mbfile = &argv[optind+1];
00088 
00089   SlaterDet Q[2];
00090   Symmetry S[2];
00091 
00092   int i;
00093   for (i=0; i<2; i++) {
00094     extractSymmetryfromString(&mbfile[i], &S[i]);
00095     if (readSlaterDetfromFile(&Q[i], mbfile[i]))
00096       goto cleanup;
00097   }
00098 
00099   // odd numer of nucleons ?
00100   int odd = Q[0].A % 2;
00101 
00102   // Projection parameters
00103   Projection P;
00104   initProjection(&P, odd, projpar);
00105 
00106 
00107   FormfactorPara FfP = {
00108     qmax : qmax,
00109     npoints : npoints,
00110     nalpha : nalpha,

00112     recoil : recoil
00113   };
00114

00116   int multi[NMULTIPOLES] = {0, 0, 0, 0};
00117 
00118   if (l != -1) {
00119     multi[l] = 1;
00120   } else {
00121     for (i=0; i<NMULTIPOLES; i++) multi[i] = 1;
00122   }
00123 
00124   // Project formfactor on angular momentum
00125 
00126   initOpFormfactors(&FfP);
00127 
00128   void* ffactorme[NMULTIPOLES];

00130   // read or calculate matrix elements
00131 
00132   for (i=0; i<NMULTIPOLES; i++)   
00133     ffactorme[i] = initprojectedMBME(&P, &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i]);
00134 
00135   int havetocalc = 0;
00136   for (i=0; i<NMULTIPOLES; i++)   
00137       if (readprojectedMBMEfromFile(mbfile[0], mbfile[1], &P,
00138                                     &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i], S[0], S[1],
00139                                     ffactorme[i]))
00140         havetocalc = 1;
00141 
00142   if (havetocalc) {
00143 
00144     // test matrix elements only ? return error code
00145     if (test) {
00146       fprintf(stderr, "... missing or corrupt matrix elements\n");
00147       return -1;
00148     }
00149 
00150     // calculate all multipoles
00151     calcprojectedMBMEs(&P, &OpMultipoleFormfactors, &Q[0], &Q[1],
00152                           S[0], S[1], ffactorme);
00153 
00154     // but only write the ones wanted
00155     for (i=0; i<NMULTIPOLES; i++)

00157         writeprojectedMBMEtoFile(mbfile[0], mbfile[1], &P, 
00158                                  &OpMultipoleFormfactor[i], S[0], S[1],
